function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Fluctuating demands for medical equipment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and knowledge about covid-19 mitigation and early detection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of onsite energy generation, integrated storage units, or grid connection in healthcare buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration with local communities may lead to increased risk of contagious disease propagation","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of latent customer needs","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The high level of uncertainty and unreliability in the availability of unskilled work within the communities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper disposal of non-biodegradable personal protective gears leading to environmental pollution","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Long-term collaboration and stakeholder engagement required for successful disease mitigation initiatives.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underestimation of the necessity of air disinfection in a wider variety of public settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on multiple technologies such as biosensors, 3d scanning, and multi-agent systems may introduce compatibility issues and data integration challenges.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Stigmatism and distrust in health services resulting in efforts to hide cases of contagious diseases ebola, sars, influenza, tuberculosis .","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inefficient wind-driven ventilation leading to stagnant air and poor air quality","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unclear effect of physicochemical features of gbns on antibacterial activity","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of equation-based models to simulate the epidemic dynamics","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"People gathering on balconies increases the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited application of guidelines may lead to inadequate disease mitigation measures in residential buildings.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collection of data from iphone users without explicit consent","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid return to high levels of emissions and urban air pollution after crisis","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in physical activity behavior compared to pre-pandemic levels","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of financial default","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 within construction sites due to lack of safety protocols","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incorporation of highly related review papers","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceptions of covid-19 as a travel-associated risk leading to a planned shift in typical travel behaviors.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential disruptions in lead times and prices for infrastructure and equipment due to the pandemic and closed international exchange markets.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of studies on urban green spaces in developing countries","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of free and accessible data formats","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Off-gassing of chemical compounds from housing materials","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of adaptation strategies to enhance long-term performance","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variation in reliable information on covid-19 transmission between countries","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overcrowding and lack of physical distancing","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of gps and personal data by bluetooth-based apps","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Studies related to the pandemic may have limitations due to the sars-cov-2 outbreak, impacting the randomization of the sample.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to meet cleaning standards for hvac systems","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of environmental noise for visualization of heat-map","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cultural differences in work environment expectations","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-adjustment for vaccinations administered abroad in register-based vaccination rates","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of focus on promoting mental health and well-being.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Partial order assigned due to lack of virus propagation prevention measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Consideration of masking alone as sufficient protection from sars-cov-2 outbreaks in the workplace","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on telemedicine for diagnosis and treatment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete coverage of mild or asymptomatic cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transition from physical workspace to virtual and agile workspace.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in global co2 emissions due to pandemic-related changes in social practices and energy use","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Financial strain on mortgage lenders","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through contact with documents and articles.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decline in tax base of many cities due to the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation related to covid-19 on social media","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Multiple-choice questions with no restrictions on the number of answers may lead to data ambiguity and incomplete information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation or false data through unverified social media channels and personal contacts.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Crowded living conditions leading to the spread of communicable diseases","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
